> Okay, so it's an excuse to send another test message through, but 
still a valid question.  Do we have any musical people here among 
us?  Anyone written any songs related to the Shinsengumi?

I started writing a song for Jidai Monogatari, called "Shirayuki" 
(snow-white), from Yuki's POV, thinking about Hiro and the 
Shinsengumi. It got stuck after the first line, though...

--M.
